review: I am very impressed with the fire stick.I hope more people will purchase great little device
author: H. Moore "HLMoore"

review: This is absolutely fantastic. Right out of the box, it started installing and no problems whatever. It sure has a lot to offer and the remote is really cool. I'm sure after using it for a while and watching a few movies, it will more than pay for itself. Even my 62 year old wife figured out how to work it with no complaints. That's great.
author: SOUPY

review: Fast and easy install. I have only used Amazon Prime and the stream is excellent. This is a great product at a very reasonable price.I was too quick with my original review. I was in the middle of a movie when the Fire Stick died. It lost internet connection and network properties showed "connected with problems". I did a factory reset and now cannot connect to my router. All of my other wireless devices work fine. This is going back.
author: GerryC "GerryC"

review: I really like streaming device.  I have been a Roku fan in the past...they are great.  However, I am belong to Amazon Prime, which, makes the Fire Stick a better and very cost effective option.  As good as or better than the Roku for other applications, but both are good products
author: Mike

review: Great product. Interface feels more intuitive to me than Apple TV. It would be 5 stars if I could connect my iTunes and Macbook Air through it like I can with AppleTV
